speaker:
FIRST
               
              OUTLAW
text:
Come
              ,
               
              come
              ,
               
              be
               
              patient
              .
               
              We
               
              must
               
              bring
               
              you
               
              to
               
              our
               
              captain
              .

speaker: SYLVIA
text:
A
               
              thousand
               
              more
               
              mischances
               
              than
               
              this
               
              one

speaker: SYLVIA
text:
Have
               
              learned
               
              me
               
              how
               
              to
               
              brook
               
              this
               
              patiently
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              OUTLAW
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              the
               
              gentleman
               
              that
               
              was
               
              with
               
              her
              ?

speaker:
THIRD
               
              OUTLAW
text:
Being
               
              nimble-footed
              ,
               
              he
               
              hath
               
              outrun
               
              us
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              OUTLAW
text:
But
               
              Moyses
               
              and
               
              Valerius
               
              follow
               
              him
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              OUTLAW
text:
Go
               
              thou
               
              with
               
              her
               
              to
               
              the
               
              west
               
              end
               
              of
               
              the
               
              wood
              ;

speaker:
THIRD
               
              OUTLAW
text:
There
               
              is
               
              our
               
              captain
              .
               
              We’ll
               
              follow
               
              him
               
              that’s
               
              fled
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              OUTLAW
text:
The
               
              thicket
               
              is
               
              beset
              ;
               
              he
               
              cannot
               
              ’scape
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              OUTLAW
text:
Come
              ,
               
              I
               
              must
               
              bring
               
              you
               
              to
               
              our
               
              captain’s
               
              cave
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              OUTLAW
text:
Fear
               
              not
              ;
               
              he
               
              bears
               
              an
               
              honorable
               
              mind

speaker:
FIRST
               
              OUTLAW
text:
And
               
              will
               
              not
               
              use
               
              a
               
              woman
               
              lawlessly
              .

speaker: SYLVIA
text:
O
               
              Valentine
              ,
               
              this
               
              I
               
              endure
               
              for
               
              thee
              !
